reference: Source: http://www.systemicpeace.org/polity/polity4 Autocracy An indicator variable coded 1 if the Polity 2 score from the 2010 Polity IV data set is equal or larger than 0. The Polity2 score is computed by subtracting a county's autocracy score from its democracy score. The resulting unified polity scale ranges from +10 (strongly democratic) to-10 (strongly autocratic).
Wolfinger, R. and S. Rosenstone. 1980. Who Votes? New Haven, CT: Yale University Press.

Democracy An indicator variable coded 1 if the Polity 2 score from the 2010 Polity IV data set is below 0. The Polity2 score is computed by subtracting a county's autocracy score from its democracy score. The resulting unified polity scale ranges from +10 (strongly democratic) to-10 (strongly autocratic).
